item.description: Profile Born in 1994, he received his bachelor’s degree in engineering at NIT, Ishikawa College, Japan in 2018. He is currently in the master’s program at Graduate School of Interdisciplinary Information Studies, The University of Tokyo. His interests are HCI, VR/AR, and computer vision. Publication Demo Laval Virtual ReVolution 2018 (Weekend). April 4—8, 2018. Laval, France.
